Akli Yahiatene (amụrụ na 1933) bụ onye na-agụ egwu Amazigh-Kabyle, si Algeria
A mụrụ ya na Aït-Mendes, nke dị nso Boghni (wilaya nke Tizi Ouzou)

O wee kwaga France n'afọ ndị 1950, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Citroën ma kwado Algeria Front de libération nationale (FLN), nke a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọtụtụ ugboro ebe o dere ọtụtụ egwu. Ịbụ onye a ma ama dịgidere site na 1950s ruo 1970s.
